meanings.definition: A plant hormone that promotes growth and elongation of stems.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used gibberellin to help his plants grow taller.
meanings.sent2: Gibberellin is important for making plants grow longer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome sprinkled gibberellin on the flowers, making them reach for the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for gardening was like gibberellin, fueling the growth of her passion.
meanings.sent5: The effect of gibberellin on the plants was like magic, causing them to stretch towards the sun.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of plant hormones that stimulate stem elongation, germination, and flowering.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use gibberellin to help seeds sprout and grow.
meanings.sent2: Gibberellin plays a role in making stems longer and flowers bloom.
meanings.sent3: The garden was so full of gibberellin that even the rocks seemed to be growing.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like gibberellin, sparking new growth and creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The power of gibberellin in the soil was evident as the plants shot up overnight.
